James Little (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nlekọta. A maara ya màkà ọrụ ya nke geometric abstraction nke na-enwekarị ụcha mara mma. Ọ bi na New York City.
A mụrụ Little na 1962 na Memphis, Tennessee, ma too na South America. O sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị Africa America.

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Memphis Academy of Art (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Memphis College of Art), mgbè ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ, a na-eto ọrụ ya ma họrọ ya na 1973 màkà ngosi na Arkansas Arts Center site na Gerald Nordland. O nwetara ákàrà ugo mmụta BFA ya na Memphis Academy of Art na 1974. N'afọ 1976, Little nwetara ákàrá ugo mmụta MFA na Mahadum Syracuse dị na Syracuse, New York.
Little kwùrù na Mitchell tinyere Barnett Newman, Mark Rothko, Franz Kline, Alma Thomas, na George L
Morris so n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya na-enwe mmasị na ya
O kwùrù banyéré modus operani nke ọrụ nke ya (nke ahụ)......"Abstraction nyere m mkpebi onwé onye na nnwere onwe ime nhọrọ
Achọghị m nnwere onwe n'ụdị ọ bụla ọzọ
Ndị mmadụ na-achọ ịnwe azịza tupu ha enwee ahụmịhe
Abstraction anaghị enye gị nke ahụ
" Onye nkatọ Karen Wilkin akpọwo ọrụ Little (dị ka nke nwere) ahụike na-adọrọ mmasị" na
"orchestrations nke geometry na chroma iji mee ka anya anyị nwee obi ụtọ ma kpalie mmetụta na ọgụgụ isi anyị..Nke a bụ ihe a na-akpọ.
N'afọ 2009, Little ritere ihe nríte Joan Mitchell Foundation. Ọ bụkwa ónyé natara onyinye Pollock-Krasner Foundation.

N'afọ 2019, Little haziri ihe ngosi "New York Centric" na gallery nke American Fine Arts Society nke gụnyere ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ metụtara nnukwu Metropolis gụnyere Alma Thomas, Alvin Loving, Larry Poons, Stanley Boxer, Peter Reginato, Dan Christensen, Ronnie Landfield, Gabriele Evertz, Charles Hinman, Thornton Willis, Doug Ohlson, Robert Swain, na Ed Clark.
